project.description:
This Jenkins Job allow the user to create a brand new Gerrit repository
and its Jenkins Job flow (Release, PreCommit).

Confluence: Automated job to create new Gerrit repositories and Pipeline Jobs based on a cENM specific archetype

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPO_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide repo name by replacing REPO_NAME text.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
CI_REPO="OSS/com.ericsson.oss.containerisation/enm-containerisation-ci-pipeline" ARCH_REPO="OSS/com.ericsson.oss.containerisation/enm-cn-ci-pipeline-archtype-generator"
git clone ${GERRIT_MIRROR}/${ARCH_REPO} git clone ${GERRIT_MIRROR}/${CI_REPO}
REPO=${REPO_NAME// /} ARTIFACT_ID=${REPO##*/} ARCH_ARTIFACT_ID=${ARCH_REPO##*/} PARENT_GROUP_RIGHTS=${PARENT_GROUP_RIGHTS// /}
#define Gerrit guardian groups GUARD_GROUP_NAME="CTF_guard Cloud_Native_TC_Group cENM_Guard" GURAD_GROUP1="CTF_guard" GURAD_GROUP2="Cloud_Native_TC_Group" GURAD_GROUP3="cENM_Guard"
echo "Tell $ARTIFACT_ID"
echo "*******************Creating the repository in Gerrit*****************"
echo "*******************Creating repository "$REPO" with required master branch only********************"
GERRIT_CENTRAL_HOST=$(echo ${GERRIT_CENTRAL} | sed -e 's/ssh:\/\/\(.*\):29418/\1/')
ssh -p 29418 ${GERRIT_CENTRAL_HOST} gerrit ls-projects | grep -Fx ${REPO}
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "${REPO} already existing" else echo "Proceed to ${REPO} creation" ssh -p 29418 ${GERRIT_CENTRAL_HOST} gerrit create-project --parent ${PARENT_GROUP_RIGHTS} ${REPO} -b master --empty-commit -o CI_Infrastructure_ENM_admin || { echo 'ERROR: Check Job Parameters'; exit 1; } fi
echo "*******************Adding access rights for "${GUARD_GROUP_NAME}"*******************"
mkdir temporary_folder mkdir test cd test git init
git pull ${GERRIT_CENTRAL}/${REPO} refs/meta/config
#manage multiple guardian groups IFS=' ' read -ra ADDR <<< "${GUARD_GROUP_NAME}" for group in "${ADDR[@]}"; do ssh -p 29418 ${GERRIT_CENTRAL_HOST} gerrit ls-groups -v | grep ${group} > output.txt GroupID_Sub=$(grep ^${group} output.txt | cut -f 2) rm output.txt echo -e "${GroupID_Sub}\t${group}" >> groups done
git add . git commit -m "${JIRA_TICKET}: Added new group" git push ${GERRIT_CENTRAL}/${REPO} HEAD:refs/meta/config
echo "************* groups file pushed **************" echo "*************config file push******************"
rm -rf project.config
echo -e "[access] inheritFrom = ${PARENT_GROUP_RIGHTS} [access \"refs/*\"] owner = group CI_Infrastructure_ENM_admin" > project.config
echo -e "create = group ${GURAD_GROUP1}" >> project.config; echo -e "create = group ${GURAD_GROUP2}" >> project.config; echo -e "forgeCommitter = group ${GURAD_GROUP1}" >> project.config; echo -e "forgeCommitter = group ${GURAD_GROUP2}" >> project.config; echo -e "pushTag = group ${GURAD_GROUP1}" >> project.config; echo -e "pushTag = group ${GURAD_GROUP2}" >> project.config; echo -e "label-Code-Review = -2..+2 group ${GURAD_GROUP1}" >> project.config; echo -e "label-Code-Review = -2..+2 group ${GURAD_GROUP2}" >> project.config; echo -e "label-Code-Review = -2..+2 group ${GURAD_GROUP3}" >> project.config; echo -e "label-Verified = -1..+1 group ${GURAD_GROUP1}" >> project.config; echo -e "label-Verified = -1..+1 group ${GURAD_GROUP2}" >> project.config; echo -e "label-Verified = -1..+1 group ${GURAD_GROUP3}" >> project.config; echo -e "rebase = group ${GURAD_GROUP1}" >> project.config; echo -e "rebase = group ${GURAD_GROUP2}" >> project.config; echo -e "submit = group ${GURAD_GROUP3}" >> project.config;
echo -e "[project] description = [receive] requireChangeId = true [submit] action = fast forward only mergeContent = false [access \"refs/for/refs/heads/master\"]" >> project.config
echo -e "pushMerge = group ${GURAD_GROUP3}" >> project.config;
echo -e "[access \"refs/heads/master\"]" >> project.config
echo -e "push = group ${GURAD_GROUP3}" >> project.config; echo -e "exclusiveGroupPermissions = push pushMerge" >> project.config; echo -e "pushMerge = group ${GURAD_GROUP3}" >> project.config;
echo -e "[plugin \"eiffel\"] enabled = true rmq-domain = eiffel004.camo.gerrit rmq-exchange = mb401-eiffel004 rmq-server = amqp://mb401-eiffel004.mo.ca.am.ericsson.se:5672" >> project.config
git add . git commit -m "${JIRA_TICKET}: Added access controls" git push ssh://gerrit.ericsson.se:29418/${REPO} HEAD:refs/meta/config cd .. rm -rf test/ myWorkspace=$(pwd)
echo REPO=${REPO} > $myWorkspace/env.properties echo CI_REPO=${CI_REPO} >> $myWorkspace/env.properties echo RELEASE_JOB=${REPO_NAME##*/} >> $myWorkspace/env.properties echo PRECOMMIT_JOB=${REPO_NAME##*/}'_precommit' >> $myWorkspace/env.properties
echo "*******************Running Archetype Generator Tool*****************"
if [ "${REPO_TYPE}" == Empty ]; then exit 0 elif [ "${REPO_TYPE}" == Service_Group ]; then service_type=0 else service_type=2 fi echo "Tell $service_type" git clone ssh://gerrit.ericsson.se:29418/${REPO}
cd ${ARCH_ARTIFACT_ID} docker build . -t archgen_pcr #docker run --entrypoint "sh" -v ${WORKSPACE}/temporary_folder:/data/output archgen_pcr -c "python run.py --service_name $ARTIFACT_ID --service_type $service_type --service_description TestSG --path_of_archtype /data/output --product_number 123456 --is_depend_on_jboss_base_image n" docker run --entrypoint "sh" $(for group in $(id -G); do printf ' --group-add %s' "$group"; done) --group-add $(stat -c '%g' /var/run/docker.sock) --user "$(id -u):$(id -g)" -v ${HOME}/.docker:${HOME}/.docker -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v $myWorkspace/temporary_folder:/data/output archgen_pcr -c "python run.py --service_name $ARTIFACT_ID --service_type $service_type --service_description TestSG --path_of_archtype /data/output --product_number 123456 --is_depend_on_jboss_base_image n"
cd .. cp -r $myWorkspace/temporary_folder/${ARTIFACT_ID}/* ${ARTIFACT_ID} cd ${ARTIFACT_ID}
git add --all git commit -m "${JIRA_TICKET}: Adding artifacts/archetype" git push
echo "************* end ******************"
